name: Warranted App
description: The “warranted” Jewelers Block application has been a staple of the inland marine product for many years and represents essentially the sole mechanism for garnering relevant underwriting and rating information about insured risks. The application is a multi-page document which is filled out by the prospect or insured or by the agent in discussion with the prospect or insured. The document is signed by the prospect or insured certifying the information relevant to their insurance risk/needs is accurate.

name: HSB Water Sensors
description: IoT device which targets the presence of moisture and/or falling temperature, humidity, and power/wifi outage and alerts the property owner via a mobile application so that mitigation efforts may be deployed.
